summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6718 for the improvement of Rainier Avenue South, east side only, from 39th Avenue South to approximately 120 feet north of South Edmunds Street; and certain other streets and an avenue, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof upon the property within the district; establishing a local improvement fund, and amending Ordinance 108720 to revise the maximum interest payable on local improvement bonds.
